name: Perplexive Perspective
description:
Sqwink doesn't know how he got there, but he's in the middle of an active volcano. On top of that he seems to be in the wrong game. Help this little Lava-Turtle get back to his home in this Top-Down Platformer.

Controls

  •  WASD - Movement
  • Space - Jump
  • K - Skip Time

Aim

  • Bring Sqwink back to his home.

Tools

  • Unity 2017
  • Photoshop
  • Toggl
  • MagicaVoxel
  • Blender
  • Audacity
  • Ableton Live

Spoiler Tips Section

  • 1-1 Movin’ – Use the WASD keys to move.
  • 1-2 TimeSkips n’ Chill – Use the K key to sKip time to glean info about the 3d structures from the shadows they cast.
  • 1-3 Baby Steps – Try skipping time to view the platforms better.
  • 2-1 Crossing Paths – A well timed jump is all you need.
  • 2-2 Squeeze – A skip in time saves nine
  • 2-3 Riding Shadows – Standing on the edge of a platform can show your shadow more clearly.
  • 3-1 Stay A While – Is there any way to go on the lower level?
  • 3-2 Hot Rox – Make sure to keep track of both the platform you’re jumping to and the next one.
  • 3-3 Helix – Aka Spiral.
